alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 9:06PM MDT until July 30 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Fort Pearce Wash. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 902 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. One to three inches of rain has fallen along upstream portions of Fort Pearce Wash. This will result in high flows through the wash and flooding along low lying areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Locations along Fort Pearce Wash including southeastern portions of St George.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
